title: Five children and It
brief_description: When Cyril, Anthea, Bob and Jane visit the seaside for a holiday, they discover the sandpit home of a Psammead, a strange looking sand fairy with the marvellous ability to make wishes come true. The children begin wishing - to be rich, to be beautiful - all with disastrous results. But then, they go even further and wish their baby brother Lamb away … Based on the classic children’s novel by E. Nesbit, author of “The Railway children”
